about.title: About Me
about.text3: I decided to pursue my passion for new technologies in order to become an Expert. I signed up for ESIEA, which trains the best Engineers and
about.text5: The adoption of pedagogy by project made me discover new technologies, work methodologies and softskills essential to the smooth running of a project

about.text12: I am also familiar with TypeScript, PosgreSQL and MongoDB. I am always looking to learn new technologies. I am currently looking for a

projects.title: My Projects
projects.surfer: Professional social network to publish articles based on interests, to follow people, to create Spaces Topics around a community.
projects.demineur: Minesweeper Games consisting of 03 levels of difficulty and timed by player game. The player can pause and resume the game later.
projects.community: Web application based on communication channels like Slack to exchange text or voice messages, videos, photos and files. It also includes vocal recognition with transcription and emojis

experiences.title: My Experiences
experiences.iai: Graduated as a Computer Works Engineer after 03 years of intense studies and academic projects carried out. Obtaining an Excellent mention during the defense.
experiences.gmc: Management of a team of 05 people. Implementation of interfaces for tracking insurance certificates and algorithm for generating attestation batches after in-store delivery.
experiences.esiea: Graduate Bachelor in Computer Science after an internship of 06 months and a validated defense.
experiences.intership: Development of the web quiz (web app) for website audit and data collection. Implementation of automated pipelines on Power Automate (Cloud and Desktop) communicating with Webhooks on the Azatys API in Flask(Python).
experiences.alternance: Development of the Azatys platform in SAAS and its API in Flask for the provision of data processed by SARA. Cloud environment management.
experiences.expert: Creation of an IOS meeting application with automatic transcription, Implementation of a data structure to structure the data contained in a large log file and read it quickly to optimize the API response time.
